name: U.F.O Text Quest
description:
Resting in nature, the protagonist notices an alien spacecraft in the sky and voluntarily agrees to abduction and experiments.

A classic text adventure in the style of interactive fiction from computers from the 80s like the Commodore 64.

A test project to demonstrate the possibilities of using ASCII Art in projects created in Tuesday JS.

Tuesday JS page: https://kirill-live.itch.io/tuesday-js

Tuesday JS GitHu: https://github.com/Kirilllive/tuesday-js

I will be glad to support the project onx patreon or PayPal
